argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lidlss.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lidlss.i | |- I = ( LIdeal ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_rlmbas | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` W ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_eqtri | |- B = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` W ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_lidlval | |- ( LIdeal ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` ( ringLMod ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_eqtri | |- I = ( LSubSp ` ( ringLMod ` W ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_lssss | |- ( U e. I -> U C_ B ) |
